DESCRIPTION.P: This block is a Super Block constructed by feeding back the output of an event delay block into its input event port. The unique output of this block generates a regular train of events.

ITEM.label: Period
ITEM.SP: : scalar. One over the frequency of the clock. Period is the time that separates two output events.

ITEM.label: Init time
ITEM.SP: : scalar. Starting date. if negative the clock never starts.
